verbs.description: attack prompts warning of aggressive animals at [ARG1: dog park] [V: martinez] [ARGM-PRD: bcn] the city of martinez has issued an advisory about safety procedures at the city temporary dog park adjacent to the john muir amphitheater following the recent attack of a dog there by other dogs resulting in moderate injuries the advisory posted on the city website this week describes recent reports of aggressive animals at the temporary dog park near the martinez marina a sept 11 social media post described an attack of a small gray and white dog with several puncture wounds the poster said her dog was attacked by four huskies martinez martinez marina dog park contra costa county animal control services temporary dog park
